text:
Hey everyone

My cofounder and I have been researching into a subset of end-user programming and how to make automation and AI more accessible. 

We are growing the team and keen to speak with a London based Head of Product folks who are looking for new roles that love this space (hence asking here!)

Would be happy to chat - just DM me :)
<https://www.thehumbleai.com/careers-jobs|https://www.thehumbleai.com/careers-jobs>

P.s if this shouldn’t be posted here just let me know and otherwise I can remove it
